bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ZLBC 䵟 䵟 . Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry gu yang jiao 羖羊角 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 療面多 皯 𪒟 如雀卵色。以羖羊膽一枚，酒二升，合煮三沸以塗拭之，日三度， 差 , “To cure numerous dermal dark speckles in one’s face with the color of sparrow eggs, take 1 gu yang gallbladder and heat with 2 sheng of wine three times until boiling. Then apply externally three times daily. This will bring the cure”.
